titles.title: To prohibit imports into the United States of meat products from the European Community until certain unfair trade barriers are removed, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: 3/25/1993--Introduced. Declares it is U.S. policy that the European Community's Third Country Meat Directive is an unfair nontariff trade barrier and that it is in the public interest to remove barriers to exports of U.S. meat products. Directs the President to prohibit the importation of all European Community meat products.
